alert.note: Alert for Barnes (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 8:25PM CDT until May 08 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Barnes County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 824 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ypsilanti, or 23 miles west of Valley City, moving east at 15 mph. At 812 PM CDT, the public reported quarter sized hail 7 miles southeast of Jamestown. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Barnes County. This includes Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 272 and 282. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
